text: we get about a kilogram and a half in
the Soyuz that we're allowed to take
with us so not much it all has to be
wrapped up in these lock bags I've got
things like a sick bag which is very
important most astronauts at some point
will feel fairly unwell in the first two
days this is really special it's a book
that Helen Shulman gave to me she flew
to the MIR Space Station in 91 in his
Eureka Karen's book signed by Yuri and
I'm gonna sign it up there as well other
bits and bobs there that you know
exercise equipment shoes for exercising
flashlights in case the electrics fail
that kind of stuff photographs of family
things that you might want to return
that have been flown in space things
that I want to give to my sons when
they're older we know when they turn 18
that kind of thing
